definitions.explanation: The Power BI data category for the entity or attribute this property is added for.

hasParameters.name: is.extension.pbi:dataCategory
hasParameters.explanation: Default parameter since extension isn't an object.

definitions.explanation: The mashup query and properties for the current document.

hasParameters.name: fastCombine
hasParameters.explanation: The fastCombine for the mashup query.

hasParameters.name: allowNativeQueries
hasParameters.explanation: Set if native queries are allowed.

hasParameters.name: document
hasParameters.explanation: The mashup query for the current document.

hasParameters.name: queriesMetadata
hasParameters.explanation: Dictionary of query name to it's metadata containing query id, name, entity name etc.

definitions.explanation: The refresh policy for the entity. Full Refresh and Incremental Refresh are potential examples from Power BI.

hasParameters.name: $type
hasParameters.explanation: The type of the refresh policy.

hasParameters.name: location
hasParameters.explanation: The root location to use for refresh.

hasParameters.name: rollingWindowGranularity
hasParameters.explanation: The granularity of the rolling window for the incremental refresh. it can be day, month, quarter or year.

hasParameters.name: incrementalGranularity
hasParameters.explanation: The granularity of the incremental period in the window. it can be day, month, quarter or year.

definitions.explanation: The refresh bookmark for the last refresh of the partition.

hasParameters.name: $type
hasParameters.explanation: The type of source of the partition.

hasParameters.name: start
hasParameters.explanation: The start date time for the ranged partition.

hasParameters.name: end
hasParameters.explanation: The end date time for the ranged partition.

definitions.explanation: The timezone for which the times specified in the document are valid.
